name: 2D Platformer (Lt.Coffee)
description:
You play as Guy and by defeating the Pig Boss and Plant Boss can you complete the game. BEWARE for the traps.

A beta type of the game doesn't have any official name yet

2D Platformer is in its Early Access Version 3.1 and I'm still planning to add a Upgrade Shop to use the coins in the game, maybe some stories and add more levels depending on the story that I can come up with.
